title: New: Tyler, The Creator- Yonkers
body:
![](http://www.liveforthefunk.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/11/37885_142649739088243_100000296539055_338774_2927217_n.jpg "tyler the creator")It’s been all over blogs and publications like the plague in the last 24 hours and it’s not hard to see why. The new single/video from acclaimed MC ‘Tyler, The Creator’ is haunting, disturbing and fascinating in equal measure. Check out the video and download the single below. Oh and don’t forget to look out for the album ‘GOBLIN’ when it drops this spring.

[Tyler, The Creator – Yonkers](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/4463-new-tyler-the-creator-yonkers/attachment/yonkers)
